entry.title: 6/30 - Call for Entries: "Memento Mori"

====== DESCRIPTION ======

Target Gallery invites artists working in all visual media to submit to Memento Mori. According to the Merriam-Webster dictionary, â€œMemento moriâ€ is the literal Latin translation for â€œâ€˜remember (that you have) to dieâ€. The purpose of this exhibition is to explore death as a concept and how it affects our lives. Through explorations of entropy/decay, ghosts and paranormal spirits, or personal experiences, this exhibit will contemplate how the inevitability of death impacts us all.

Exhibition Dates: September 28 â€“ November 3

Exhibition Juror: Laura Roulet, independent curator and writer


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

All applications must be submitted through our online application via Submittable.com.

Apply and view guidelines:
https://torpedofactoryartcenter.submittable.com/submit/139805/memento-mori-at-target-gallery

For questions about the opportunity, contact Target Gallery at targetgallery@alexandriava.gov or call at 703-746-4590.
